header.gameNote: SAN JUAN SHOOTOUT AT SAN JUAN PR

article.headline: Utah 94, Virginia 70
article.story: SAN JUAN, Puerto Rico (AP) -- Luke Nevill and Johnnie Bryant each scored 26 points to lead Utah to a 90-74 victory Wednesday over Virginia in the consolation round of the San Juan Shootout. Nevill was 10-for-12 from the field and had 11 rebounds for Utah (5-6), which led 40-28 at halftime. Utah shot 62.3 percent from the field and held Virginia to 41.7 percent. J.R. Reynolds scored 25 points and Sean Singletary added 11 for Virginia (6-3).
